title: "NLP_DATA_CLEANING"
author: "Caitlin Volante"
date: "2025-10-19"
output: html_document
---

load packages
```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(glmertree)
library(lmerTest)
```

read in excel file
```{r}
df <- read_excel("AI_CODING_SHEET.xlsx") # load in df

df <- df[, -c(11:12, 27:32)] # remove columns related to memory data and story idea units

df <- df[!is.na(df$free_response) & df$free_response != "", ] # remove rows that don't have information 

df$free_response <- gsub("%2C", "", df$free_response) # identify and remove %2C anomaly related to punctuation

write.csv(df, "narrative_free_response_data.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```

read in .csv of data that now has sentiment information in it
```{r}
sentiment_df <- read.csv("sentiment_free_response_data.csv")
```

Run the model for positive scores 
```{r}
pos_model <- lmer(NRC_positive ~ story_condition_numeric + (1|id) + (1|group) + (1|story_name), data = sentiment_df)
summary(pos_model)
```

Run the model for negative scores 
```{r}
neg_model <- lmer(NRC_negative ~ story_condition_numeric + (1|id) + (1|group) + (1|story_name), data = sentiment_df)
summary(neg_model)
```
